title: 2018 Week 17 Preview
itunes:title: 2018 Week 17 Preview
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler (in spirit) and Chris Wesseling – react to the upcoming final week of the NFL regular season, including – Matt Patricia’s Lions traveling to Green Bay (6:40), can Watson and Houston earn their 11th win of the season against the Jags (10:35), SDarn and company travel to New England for an AFC East bash (15:25), the GGGMEENNN aim to end their season off on a high note versus Dallas (26:00), is Baker feeling dangerous enough to propel the Browns over the Ravens and send Cleveland to the playoffs (34:30) and who will claim the AFC West? Is the Chargers’ offense resilient enough to defeat Denver (40:50) and/or will the rowdy Raiders play spoiler in KC (43:40)? Also, is Kevin Stefanski’s offense enough to trump Chicago’s defense (50:20), what are the chances Philly makes the playoffs (1:02:00) and lastly, Titoons fans can revel in Ol’ Zeuser dropping the infamous moniker if they incinerate Indy and earn a post season berth on SNF (1:05:00)!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
